name: The World of Labyrinths: Labyronia
description: Labyronia has been remade, returning as the definitive version of the first game. Expanding the original story and introducing revamped visuals and gameplay mechanics, this is the best way to experience the popular RPG. To save the world, you must uncover the secrets of the Labyrinths!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
